issue.title: [C++] Linting could be faster
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2111](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2111). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `make lint` style-checks C++ files sequentially (by calling `cpplint`). We could instead style-check those files in parallel.
